events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I would like to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The reported issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about wanting their money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. to assist with the refund process.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, may I also ask why you would like to return the product? This will help us improve our service.
Order number is 123456789. The product was not as described on the website and didn’t work as expected, so I want a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund once you return the product. I will send you the return shipping label via email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate receiving the return label soon so I can send the product back.
The return label was sent and the refund has been processed after receiving the returned product. Please check your account for the refund confirmation.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Your case has been closed as the refund process is complete. Thank you for contacting customer support, and have a great day!
